overview: A XXX parody of the classic 1984 crime drama Scarface.  When Tony Montana claims asylum in Miami in search of the American Dream, he soon discovers a thirst for power, money and control of 'the juice' - a contraband aphrodisiac sex aid that's taken the country's underground sex addicts by storm. Everyone wants to try this slippery stuff that turns sex into an orgiastic fantasy. Tony wants a bigger, harder, wetter piece of the pie than any 'juice' gangster has ever taken, and he's soon supplying the nation with the purest form of lube available. But soon after Tony kills his boss and takes his woman, he does what all dealers should never do - he gets hooked on his own product - and it leads him down the path of destruction.
title: Official Scarface Parody
